question: This bank launches "Smart Banking 247 e-Lobbies" for their customers.
explanation: Kotak Mahindra Bank "Smart Banking 24x7" e-Lobbies gives customers the freedom to complete banking transactions at any hour of the day as per their convenience. It offers 24x7 access to a range of banking services such as cash withdrawals, cash deposits, and cheque deposits. These e-lobbies have been structured to give an easy and non-intrusive banking experience.
